CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 22, 1952, p. 24, reads: "Hats Off to 'Hot Sauce' of Cleveland!  Barbeque Man - Ernest Fairchild, a professional barbecue man and cook, who has been associated with 'Hot Sauce' Williams for the past eighteen years, will also be employed at 'Hot Sauce' Williams Barbecue spot. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Ernest Fairchild carving meat in Hot Sauce Williams Bar-B-Que
